mapper.sql: log_id, user_id, user_name, operation_type, client_ip, client_browser, client_system, page_url, page_title, obj_data, result_status, exception_info, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into user_operation_log (log_id, user_id, user_name, operation_type, client_ip, client_browser, client_system, page_url, page_title, obj_data, result_status, exception_info, create_time) values
(#{item.logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientBrowser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.objData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exceptionInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
